original_text: They spoke God's message to the people in Perga. Then they went down to the coast, to the town of Attalia.

sentences.original_text: They spoke God's message to the people in Perga.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 페르가 사람들에게 하나님의 메시지를 전파했습니다.

sentences.original_text: Then they went down to the coast,
